snippet: The retailer said same-store sales rose 3.7 percent in November and December, offering a glimpse of what was expected to be a strong holiday season for retailers.
abstract: J C Penney shares surge almost 20 percent after retailer reports that same-store sales rose 3.7 percent in November and December of 2014.
lead_paragraph: The retailer said same-store sales rose 3.7 percent in November and December, offering a glimpse of what was expected to be a strong holiday season for retailers.

headline.main: Shares of J.C. Penney Jump on Holiday Sales Report
headline.print_headline: Shares of J.C. Penney Jump on Holiday Sales Report
